snippet.title: Guncraft Official Steam Launch Trailer!
snippet.description:
It's here! It's finally here! You can now buy Guncraft on Steam! http://store.steampowered.com/app/241720/

We are so excited to finally have our game on the biggest PC distribution platform ever, and it's all thanks to you glorious people. You bought our game, you voted for us on Greenlight, you backed us on Kickstarter. This video is to commemorate our launch, your support, and the awesomeness of Guncraft. Block and load everyone!

Buy the Game: http://store.steampowered.com/app/241720/
Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/Exatogames
Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/Exatogames
